title: Tyagi Chef hospitality management app (jobs, candidates, interviews, clients)

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity login and a basic role model for access control (at minimum: Admin and Staff) so authenticated users can manage job openings, candidates, interviews, and clients.

quotes: tyagi chef hospitality management ke liye - job opening,  candidate, interview, and client manage karney ke liye app chaiye

acceptanceCriteria: Users can sign in and sign out with Internet Identity.
Backend stores a role for each principal (default to Staff unless set by an Admin).
Non-authenticated users cannot create/update/delete any records.
UI clearly shows the signed-in user and provides sign-out.

requirements.text: Create backend data models and CRUD APIs for Job Openings, including: title/role, client association (optional), location, salary/rate (optional), description/requirements, status (Open/Paused/Closed), createdAt/updatedAt.

quotes: job opening ... manage karney ke liye app chaiye

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes create/read/list/update/archive (or delete) operations for job openings.
Job openings can be filtered by status and searched by title/role.
All records include createdAt and updatedAt timestamps.

requirements.text: Create backend data models and CRUD APIs for Candidates, including: full name, phone/email, skills/notes, source, status (New/Screening/Interviewing/Offered/Placed/Rejected), and optional linkage to a Job Opening they are being considered for.

quotes: candidate ... manage karney ke liye app chaiye

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes create/read/list/update/archive (or delete) operations for candidates.
Candidates can be filtered by status and searched by name/contact.
A candidate can be linked/unlinked to a job opening.

requirements.text: Create backend data models and CRUD APIs for Interviews, including: candidate, job opening (optional if derived from candidate link), interview date/time, interview type (Phone/Video/In-person), interviewer name, location/meeting link, status (Scheduled/Completed/No-show/Cancelled), and outcome notes.

quotes: interview ... manage karney ke liye app chaiye

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes create/read/list/update/archive (or delete) operations for interviews.
Interviews can be listed by date range and filtered by status.
Interview records reference an existing candidate (required).

requirements.text: Create backend data models and CRUD APIs for Clients, including: company name, contact person, phone/email, address (optional), notes, and status (Active/Inactive).

quotes: client manage karney ke liye app chaiye

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes create/read/list/update/archive (or delete) operations for clients.
Clients can be searched by company name/contact.
Job openings can optionally reference a client.

requirements.text: Build a React UI with navigation for Jobs, Candidates, Interviews, and Clients, each with: list view (search + filters), create form, edit form, and detail view.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can navigate between the four main modules.
Each module supports create, view, edit, and remove/archive actions from the UI.
List views include search and at least one relevant filter (e.g., status).
Forms validate required fields and display user-friendly errors in English.

requirements.text: Add a dashboard home screen that summarizes key counts (e.g., Open Jobs, New Candidates, Interviews Scheduled Today/This Week, Active Clients) and provides quick links to create a new Job, Candidate, Interview, and Client.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard loads after login and shows at least 4 summary metrics.
Quick action buttons navigate to the relevant create forms.
Metrics update after creating/updating records (via React Query invalidation/refetch).

requirements.text: Implement consistent, creative visual theme and layout for the app (typography, spacing, components, and color palette) suitable for a professional hospitality staffing tool; avoid blue/purple as primary colors.
acceptanceCriteria: All screens share a consistent header/navigation and spacing system.
Theme uses a cohesive palette that is not primarily blue/purple.
UI uses Tailwind + existing component library composition patterns (no edits to immutable UI component sources).

requirements.text: Add static generated brand assets and wire them into the UI (app icon/favicon + login/empty-state illustration) by placing files under frontend/public/assets/generated and referencing them directly from the frontend.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated.
App displays the logo/icon in the header and uses the illustration on the sign-in or empty state screen.
No backend endpoints are used to serve these images.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths; compose components instead.
Use English for all user-facing UI text.
nonGoals: Payroll, invoicing, and accounting features are out of scope.
Real-time chat/notifications and email/SMS sending are out of scope.
Third-party auth providers other than Internet Identity are out of scope.

required: App favicon icon derived from the logo style (tyagi-chef-favicon.dim_128x128.png)

goalsToAdd: Build an app for Tyagi Chef to manage hospitality recruitment: job openings, candidates, interviews, and clients.
preferencesToAdd: Use English for user-facing UI text.
